message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this amazing product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. It's a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your life and business.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit high for my budget.  Would you consider $8,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $12,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to consider $10,500 for the product. It's still a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your life and business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  How about $9,000?

Hi Bob, I'm glad we're still in negotiations! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $10,200 for the product. It's getting close to my minimum, but I think it's still a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
